key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Determines whether the applet shows a notification on each update.

key.name: auto-update
key.description: Determines whether the applet automatically updates its weather statistics or not.

key.name: auto-update-interval
key.description: The interval, in seconds, between automatic updates.

key.name: enable-metric
key.description: Use metric units instead of english units.

key.name: distance-unit
key.description: The unit to use for visibility. Values: 'meters', 'km' ,'miles'.

key.name: pressure-unit
key.description: The unit to use for pressure. Values: 'kPa', 'hPa', 'mb', 'mmHg', 'inHg, 'atm'.

key.name: speed-unit
key.description: The unit to use for wind speed. Values: 'm/s', 'km/h, 'mph', 'knots', 'Beaufort scale'.

key.name: temperature-unit
key.description: The unit to use for temperature. Values: 'Kelvin', 'Centigrade', 'Fahrenheit'.

key.name: enable-radar-map
key.description: Fetch a radar map on each update.

key.name: location1
key.description: Nearby major zone, such as a capital city, as found from https://raw.github.com/mate-desktop/libmateweather/master/data/Locations.xml.in

key.name: location2
key.description: A unique zone for the city, as found from https://raw.github.com/mate-desktop/libmateweather/master/data/Locations.xml.in

key.name: location3
key.description: A three-digit-long code for retrieving radar maps from weather.com, found from https://raw.github.com/mate-desktop/libmateweather/master/data/Locations.xml.in

key.name: location4
key.description: The city that mateweather displays information for.

key.name: coordinates
key.description: Latitude and longitude of your location expressed in DD-MM-SS[NS] DD-MM-SS[EW].

key.name: use-custom-radar-url
key.summary: Use custom url for the radar map
key.description: If true, then retrieve a radar map from a location specified by the "radar" key.

key.name: radar
key.description: The custom url from where to retrieve a radar map.
